scripts.download-wpe-headless: cd plugins && (wget -q https://wp-product-info.wpesvc.net/v1/plugins/wpe-headless?download -O wpe-headless.zip || curl -L -o wpe-headless.zip https://wp-product-info.wpesvc.net/v1/plugins/wpe-headless?download) && unzip -o wpe-headless.zip && rm wpe-headless.zip
scripts.download-atlas-content-modeler: cd plugins && (wget -q https://wp-product-info.wpesvc.net/v1/plugins/atlas-content-modeler?download -O atlas-content-modeler.zip || curl -L -o atlas-content-modeler.zip https://wp-product-info.wpesvc.net/v1/plugins/atlas-content-modeler?download) && unzip -o atlas-content-modeler.zip && rm atlas-content-modeler.zip
scripts.download-plugins: npm run download-wpe-headless && npm run download-atlas-content-modeler
scripts.wp-env:create: npm run download-plugins && wp-env start --update && wp-env run cli wp rewrite flush
